appInformation.description:
As a leading Swiss Provider of digital identity and certificates solutions, Procivis AG supports government authorities and companies in the provision and usage of trusted online services for digital societies.

Founded in 2017, Procivis is a subsidiary of Orell Füssli and benefits from its many years of experience in the field of security printing of physical identification documents.

ble.adapterDisabled: Please turn Bluetooth on to generate QR code.
ble.missingPermissions: Please enable Bluetooth permissions to generate QR code.
ble.noSupport: Bluetooth is not available on this device

clearCacheScreen.description: Clear your app cache to force the latest credential updates to be visible.

dashboard.description: Securely backup your credentials and wallet with just a few taps. Your data is encrypted and protected by your chosen password.

empty.subtitle: You have not made a backup yet.

dashboard.title: Secure your data effortlessly.

preview.description: The following credentials will be backed up. There are some credentials that are not possible to be backed up and when recovered will be invalidated.

setPassword.description: Your backup password will enable you to encrypt and decrypt your all your backups and enable you to securely recover your personal data.

credentialDeletePrompt.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete this credential?

msoValidityIssue.notice: The validity of your credential is not updating. Please contact the issuing authority for clarification.

closeAlert.message: By closing you are rejecting this offering. This cannot be undone.

rseLocked.title:
Your Remote Secure Element is locked.
Credential issuance failed.

incompatible.title: Your Wallet is incompatible for the defined key storage type.

credentialUpdate.subtitle: The following credential(s) have been updated:

deleteWalletScreen.confirm: I understand that all credentials in %{appName} will be deleted if I continue.
deleteWalletScreen.explainer: The deletion cannot be reversed. All credentials stored in the wallet will be lost forever. Re-issuance may be subject to a fee.
deleteWalletScreen.title: Delete %{appName}

errorScreen.friendlySubtitle: An unexpected error has occurred. Please restart the app.
errorScreen.title: Something went wrong!

empty.subtitle: You have not interacted with your wallet yet.

bleAdapterDisabled.title: Please turn on Bluetooth to connect.

bleAdapterUnavailable.title: Bluetooth is not available on this device.

blePermissionMissing.title: Please enable Bluetooth permission to connect.

bleTransportDisabled.title: The Bluetooth transport is disabled in the Core configuration

connectivityUnavailable.title: No connectivity available. Please make sure that either Bluetooth or internet is available.

httpTransportDisabled.title: The HTTP transport is disabled in the Core configuration

internetDisabled.title: No internet available. Please check your Wi-Fi or cellular settings.

internetUnreachable.title: No internet available. Please check your Wi-Fi or cellular settings.

mqttTransportDisabled.title: The MQTT transport is disabled in the Core configuration

unsupportedInvitation.title:
Invalid QR code.
Please scan a supported code.

security.biometry: You are using biometric protection on your device? Consider activating it for this app and avoid entering the PIN code.
security.subtitle: We use a six digit PIN code to protect the contents of your wallet and ensure that only you can use it.

setup.description: Collect, manage and use all your digital identity credentials in one place, no matter the standard, format or protocol
setup.title: Your digital identity wallet

userAgreement.checkbox: I agree with the terms of service and acknowledge the privacy policy of the Procivis One Wallet app provided by Procivis AG.
userAgreement.subtitle: Please read and accept our terms of service and privacy policy to use the Procivis One Wallet.

pinLockModal.subtitle: Wait {{min}} min {{sec}} sec and try again.
pinLockModal.title: {{attempts}} failed attempts to enter PIN

invalidCredential.notice: This credential validity could not be confirmed. Please try again in few minutes.

multipleCredentials.notice: There is more than one version of this credential available.

rseLocked.title:
Your Remote Secure Element is locked.
The credential cannot be shared.

revokedCredential.notice: Your credential(s) have been revoked by the issuing authority. Please contact the issuing authority to learn more.

selectiveDisclosure.notice: This credential requires you to share all attributes to work.

suspendedCredential.notice: Your credential(s) have been suspended by the issuing authority. Please contact the issuing authority to learn more.

dashboard.description:
Welcome to the restoration guide for your digital wallet! If you need to revert your wallet to a previous state, this guide will walk you through the process of restoring it from a backup.

Please follow these steps carefully to ensure a successful restoration. Remember, restoring from a backup might replace your current data, potentially leading to the loss of any credentials or changes made after the backup was created.
Proceed with caution.

import.description: Please select your backup file to continue.

preview.description: You have successfully unlocked your backup and are able to reset your app to this version. You can now reset your wallet to this backup version.

recoveryPassword.description: Please enter the password to unlock your backup.

addBiometrics.instruction: Please enter your {{pinLength}}-digit PIN code to unlock your Remote Secure Element

info.description: In the next step you will set up your Remote Secure Element by choosing a {{pinLength}}-digit PIN code.
info.title: Remote Secure Element required.

sign.instruction: Please enter your {{pinLength}}-digit PIN code to unlock your Remote Secure Element
sign.title: Enter Remote PIN Code

permissionBlocked.message: In order to use biometrics enable permission
